discussions.title: Optimized Approach for Two Sum
discussions.author: User123
discussions.content: Has anyone found an efficient way to solve this problem in O(n) time?

comments.author: DevGuy
comments.content: Yes, you can use a hash map to store the complements.

comments.author: CodeMaster
comments.content: I used a brute force approach and it works, but it's O(n^2).

discussions.title: Reversing Strings in Place
discussions.author: CodeNinja
discussions.content: Is reversing in place always optimal for this problem?

comments.author: DataLover
comments.content: Yes, in-place reversal saves memory but might be slower on large strings.

discussions.title: Understanding Palindrome Logic
discussions.author: AlgoLearner
discussions.content: How do you handle negative numbers for this problem?

comments.author: BugFinder
comments.content: Negative numbers are not palindromes as the '-' is not mirrored.
